message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that is worth a great deal to me, and I believe it could be valuable to you as well. While I can't disclose all the details, I'm confident it has the potential to be a significant asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000. Consider this a chance to acquire something truly special. Let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
